div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 359 Olynthus, Macedonia, 1931 (759) Burial: c. 421 B.C. (Clement) Contents: 19 AR. From excavations Acanthus: 12 tetrob. Chalcidian League: 3 tetrob. Perdiccas II: 3 tetrob. Athens: 1: dr. Disposition: Athens Robinson, Olynthus VI, pp. 13-4, illus. Robinson-Clement, Olynthus IX, pp. 173-6, illus. (hd. V)
